charinfo.name: Fukasaku and Shima (S)
charinfo.description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) are known as the two great sage toads of Mount Myoboku. They taught both Jiraiya and Naruto sage jutsu and are each skilled in elemental techniques as well as genjutsu techniques.

abilities.name: Frog Song
abilities.description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) use their pattened genjutsu to use Frog Song. They target 1 enemy and deal 10 affliction damage for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Sand Dust
abilities.description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) use Sand Dust. All allies will be invulnerable to enemy ranged skills for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Toad Confrontation Singing
abilities.description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) use Toad Confrontation Singing on all enemies dealing 15 damage for 2 turns. If any enemy uses a new skill during Toad Confrontation Singing they will have their mental and ranged skills stunned for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Reverse Summoning
abilities.description: This skill makes Fukasaku and Shima (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
